title: Tech-Blog
description: Developed a tech blog platform that aggregates and showcases articles from various creators, built using React.js. Implemented user-friendly interfaces, Integrated Appwrite services for authentication, database management, and storage, ensuring a robust and scalable backend. This project demonstrates my ability to create dynamic web applications with a focus on performance and collaborative content management.

title: Netflix-Clone
description: A Netflix clone built with React.js and Firebase, replicating the core features of the popular streaming platform. This project showcases user authentication, data fetching, and dynamic content rendering, providing a seamless and responsive user experience.
